name: volt-absorb

effect.black-white: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.
effect.black-2-white-2: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.

short_effect: Absorbs electric moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

flavor_text.black-white: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
